Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kedzie/89th.
ShortDescription: Northbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 95th, Pulaski, 87th and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 95th, Pulaski, 87th and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/87th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
